website_summaries.verdict: Choose these sheets if you're not eager to buy pricey ones that you'll use for a couple months.
pros: Great quality for a sheet labeled as "value."
Available in a variety of colors
cons: Labeled as dryer-safe, but consider air-drying

customer_reviews.title: Good bassinet Jersey sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Soft jersey material. Light pink. Fits perfect on the Delta bassinet. Bought sheets twice.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: It is decent, if you are okay with throwing it away instead of reusing it for long time
customer_reviews.text: The feel and material is good, it doesn’t feel cheap (other than being thin). It is not durable, but it is so cheap that you can just throw it away and buy a new one, and you still spent less than for a durable one. Since this size is only good for the first 3 months of life anyway, just a few of these are enough if you don’t wash it on daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger round bassinets!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my Simmons kids deluxe gliding bassinet! I read the tag of my mattress and it worked perfectly! Nice and snug fit. I actually purchased another mattress because of how thin it was. This one is a nice size and the sheet also was a Perfect fit. Nice and soft also. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: n.renee

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are wonderful! For the price you really can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are wonderful! For the price you really can't go wrong. We got a Simmons Slumbertime Elite Bassinet as a hand me down, and these fit that mattress just fine. They are maybe a little loose, but nothing so bad that baby would suffocate or pull it up, and maybe after a few times in the dryer they will shrink up. But they are incredibly soft, and the green is a sweet mint color. And the price is just right, for how little time they spend in the bassinet, I didn't want to spend a ton of money on sheets. Can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda I

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: We’re so glad we found these sheets. We have tried many other companies and the sheets did not fit, but these are perfect. They are soft, cotton and fits my daughters Arm Reach bassinet. We bought 1 the first time to try it out and now we have 3 sheets. We would recommend these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Srobinson

customer_reviews.title: Fits Simmons Kid Gliding Bassinet mattress cover perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My baby kept splitting milk everyday while sleeping. I had to clean and dry the bassinet mattress cover daily. So I decided to look for another mattress cover to save time and electricity. This cover fits my Simmons Kids SlumberTime Elite Gliding Bassinet mattress cover perfectly. It is very soft and thin enough to dry fast, but not too thin that it won’t last. The pictures show the cover after one wash in cool water and tumble dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: After 3 buys and returns I am so glad to finally find something to fit my cosleeper! I hated to spend $25 for an armsreach co sleeper sheet-and this one is PERFECT! It is SOOO nice I wish my sheets were made this soft! I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, barely fits Graco Travel Lite Dream on Me Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. I was looking for a crib sheet to fit a Dream on Me matress used in the Graco Travel Lite Crib With Stages. It fits but barely! Doesn't go all the way under the matress on the sides. However, I am happy with it and don't think it will cause any problems. The corners fit snugly under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lc89

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the Dream On Me Karley Bassinet, they were suggested as the sheet for that bassinet. They don't fit, they are too small. I washed according to the instructions and they pull the entire mattress up as they are just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R P

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter was born last year and I really liked them. We used them for our Arms reach ...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a few sets of these when my daughter was born last year and I really liked them. We used them for our Arms reach co sleeper and they fit the mattress nice and snug. I prefer these over the sheets our co sleeper came with. Much softer and they don't cost $20+ for one sheet! We washed them weekly and they didn't shrink or loose their color. I liked them so much that I ordered them in celery and tan for my best friend who is expecting a son next month. You can't beat the price and it's excellent quality. Very soft and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: Used on Arms Reach Clearvue Co-Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: We use on the mattress that comes with Arms Reach Co-Sleeper bassinet. Overall -- would buy again ... but because of price only. 'Pros: - Fits on the mattress (requires a little jiggling as it's not as easy as the Arms Reach sheets -- but again this is a general purpose product for multiple types of bassinets vs a specific product. Also this is significantly cheaper in price). - Soft Cons: - A little thin / see through Would buy again as it's a cost effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: Raj S

customer_reviews.title: Dream On Me Karley
customer_reviews.text: Really shocked by how thin these sheets are, I mean they feel pretty cheap. However, they fit my Dream On Me Karley Bassinet mattress pad so I’m happy about that. It was a pain trying to read through reviews to see what sheets people used, and some said these didn’t fit, but for me they definitely do! I’m also using the ‘Bamboo Quilted Thicker Longer Waterproof Changing Pad Liners for Babies 3 Count (White Gourd Pattern) by BlueSnail’ on top of the mattress and then putting the sheet over for more comfort and leak protection. They work perfect together!
customer_reviews.author: THELASHMOVE | Kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: Fits OVAL bassinet fine
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Oval Delta bassinet, and they fit perfectly! I was worried they wouldn't, but they work! They say "value" so I was worried about the quality, but it's just like any other sheet I've had.
customer_reviews.author: A Neub

customer_reviews.title: Usually the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been the biggest fan of American Baby Company sheets for 8+ years. They are the ONLY sheets I bought for my 4 kids. They fit well, and they are so soft. However, these missed the mark. The elastic is only at the top and bottom, not the sides. This leaves the sides too loose and floppy for me. I have to tuck them under, which kind of defeats the purpose of a sheet. For the price, I kept them, but I prefer another brand and only use these when those are in the laundry. I still 100% stand behind their crib and playard sheets, though!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sheets for my Delta children's bassinet. I was concerned that the sheet being a rectangle, wouldn't fit with my oval mattress. Boy, was I proven wrong! Because of the rounded corners of the rectangle, and the elastic, the sheet fit quite nicely around the oval mattress of mine. The sheets are soft and perfectly cozy for my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Shrank, now they don't fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my arms reach mini arc co-sleeper. They JUST barely fit. But when I washed them according to the care instructions, they shrank to be too small. They then caused the mattress to curl up and not sit flat anymore. Totally unusable. They were fairly soft but also incredibly see-through thin. Worth a shot, but ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy F

customer_reviews.title: A+ on everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I got the 4 pack of the color "Ecru" and it matches the color of the bassinet I got perfectly (Delta Children Deluxe Sweet Beginnings Bassinet, Falling Leaves) and the size is perfect, too. Soft like a comfy T-shirt. Easy to wash. Yes, you can put them in the dryer. I haven't had them for very long though- just 2 weeks- so I don't know if they'll hold up well. It looks like they will. I also have a thick, white bassinet/mattress protector under the sheet- but if I didn't, any design from the mattress would most probably show through.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Price can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap, they're soft, and they fit our bassinet and our changing table. They're a lot thinner than other sheets I've gotten from this company, but for the price they're a great deal and I don't worry too much about them getting ruined because they're so affordable. That said, I do wish I got a darker color because stains do not come out of these easily at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color 2 times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bassinet sheet 2 times & both times I received the grey color instead of the tan color. Not a happy mom WHEN I DO NOT WANT ANY GREY !¡ Will not buy again very disappointed. It is not very soft either but not super ruff either.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Soft stretchy jersey & great packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the packing. They’re individually wrapped, not shoved in a bag like some other brands. Colors are perfect! Fabric is stretchy jersey yet soft to the touch. I purchased to use in my Ingenuity bassinet and Fisher Price vibrating bassinet which they both fit perfectly! I definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sok

customer_reviews.title: did not shrink as much as I expected but  wash cold dry cool is ridiculous for baby sheets
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is designed to go in a baby bassinet. It claims to be 100% cotton. So Why would it tell the consumer to wash in cold and dry on cool? Baby bedding should not require such care, it should stand up to being washed in hot and dried on the cotton setting (since it is cotton) without shrinking so much it no longer fits the mattress it is marketed to fit. I did wash warm and dry on medium (the same setting I use for my own sheets) and the sheets do still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size
customer_reviews.text: Cute but NOT the right size for arms reach co sleeper. Not sure if it’s just the whale print or what but it’s so small the edges of the mattress curl in. After I wash it and put it on, I have to set pillows on top of the mattress for a while to lay it flat. It eventually stays. Works but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Chicco Lullago Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Hi! Took a chance in purchasing these fir the Chicco Lullago Bassinet and they fit! They are 100% Jersey Cotton so they stretch! Haven't used it just tried them on the bassinet mattress, they do seem thin but they will do the job and the value and cotton material is good for us!
customer_reviews.author: Orangeblossom

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic bassinet sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of two sheets for our little Moses basket style bassinet. I was worried about the sheets being too big because the mattress is quite small. There is a little bit of extra fabric, but it's easily tucked under the mattress, giving the sheets a nice, safe fit. The sheets are thin and the quality is a little bit low, but for the price paid and considering we won't be using these sheets for an extended period of time (babies grow out of bassinets so fast!), they were well worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Very thin BASSINET sheet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin “sheet”, something you could easily find at the dollar store. I should have read the description better because I failed to realize that it was for a bassinet. It isn’t very soft but it would definitely get the job done for a while. It’ll only last a few washes without wearing away.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A great basic for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby’s co-sleeper. It has elastic all the way around the edges and fits the oval shaped mattress great. It’s 100% cotton, pretty soft and not stiff at all, and washes up just as easily as a t-shirt. Great value and a great price! No need to pay more if a basic sheet is wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby delight snuggle nest peak
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my baby delight beside me dreamer and it was wayy too small, so my original review was not good. But, I also have the baby delight snuggle nest peak portable bassinet and I decided to try the sheet on it and it actually fit perfect so this worked out very well in the end. Quality of the sheet is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: V W

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I "searched" for pack 'n play sheets and these pulled up. However, they are for bassinets, not pack 'n plays. I didn't catch that until after I washed them. I learned the hard way to pay very close attention to details and not depend solely on what pulls up on the search.
customer_reviews.author: kristy thompson

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, match my star themed nursery. The sheet is soft and holds up well to the washer and dryer. Great value for the money! I didn't want to get a super expensive one because let's be real, half the time it gets spit up on or pooped on, so it gets washed a lot
customer_reviews.author: Camille D.

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks a ton!
customer_reviews.text: Having a horrible time finding a sheet to fit a square bassinet mattress and saw reviews saying this one worked, it almost fit but would have worked good enough until i washed it. Shrinks a ton and now no longer able to use after washing!! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Durant West

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend these. They are as thin as can be and not very soft. It’s completely see-through so you can see the mattress through it which is odd. Also, for reference, it is too small for the MiClassic bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Randall

customer_reviews.title: They fit my 31.5x18 pad.
customer_reviews.text: They fit my arms reach bassinet that measures at 31.5"x18" and the pad lays flat. I washed warm and dried on tumble dry low they are fine. They didn't change shape or size. I wouldn't over do the washing heat just from looking at the other reviews but I'm thrilled. They are plenty thick for a newborn. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frifoley Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Good for the moneybags
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. I have 6 of them. They are very easy to clean and are pretty soft but the fit our bassist weird and curve the pad but not a lot. If yo uh have a steady pad then it would be great for safe sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: Thin but works
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty thin sheet. But it fits my arms reach cosleeper matress
customer_reviews.author: Amber V.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were so cheap I was worried but they have held up surprisingly well. They only have elastic at the two ends not on the sides but they have worked very well for me and I have been very pleasantly surprised by the way they have held up to many washings!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea A.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a round bassinet pad
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the shape of this but was having difficulty finding any round sheets. This actually still works perfectly and fits with the waterproof pad I have on top of the mattress. It does also feel like soft cotton which I really like. It's thin and lightweight which could be good or bad, but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni Dark

customer_reviews.title: Good value, fits PB Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, quite soft and fits my Pottery Barn Bassinet. However, can not give 5 stars because I found some weird small stains on it, hopefully will come off after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing product for an amazing price. Material is soft and design is adorable and gender neutral. So thankful to have this to sheet to rotate in when an accident happens in the middle of the night! It’s every bit as nice as the original sheet I bought for my son’s bassinet for a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian H

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Of course I was going to check these out because of the good reviews and low price. But in reality, they're crap. After one wash and air dry, they still shrunk. It wasn't obvious until I put them on my co-sleeper's mattress and the sides would not lay flat and they flipped off if too much pressure was placed while attempting to make the sheet snug. They can't be returned, so I'll use them as dust rags.
customer_reviews.author: Zride3

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Washed it once (cold, delicate wash, low heat, delicate tumble dry) before making up the bassinet. Held up well, no loss of elasticity or beading of cloth. It's so soft, I can't wait to lay baby down on it. (have to wait 8 more weeks for that part!)
customer_reviews.author: kimberleelee

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase agaib
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use in my Arms Reach Clear Vue Co Sleeper and they do fit it almost perfectly. They are soft,launder pretty well but are on the thin side. All in all for the price I’d say they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and fits my lullago nest bassinet. The packaging was pretty dirty and while pulling the sheets out of the plastic the sheets got dirty. Not a big deal because they will be washed, but the dirty packaging was not ideal
customer_reviews.author: Gaylynn G.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't wash well, replacement still has issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sheets and followed instructions to delicately wash and did so by themselves in washer -despite gentle cycle and cold water they unraveled and threads everywhere. Requested replacement from Amazon and received -only one of the two sheets has what looks like a pen mark in center even though it's sealed in plastic so that must be a factory issue as wasn't a mailing/packaging issue. Super annoyed and not in the mood to go through the ordeal of trying to return these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Fancy, Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits in our Arms Reach Co Sleeper perfectly! I didn’t want to spend a bunch of money on sheets our Little was just going to be using for a little while, and I especially didn’t want to spend a lot trying to find a sheet to fit her bassinet. This is perfect, and inexpensive enough that we can have plenty of sheets to avoid doing sleep-deprived laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy. Babies don’t stay in the bassinet forever. No need to break the bank buying expensive bassinet sheets. I think these work fine. They’re not top of the line but they’re soft and neat. I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Kayeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft it fits my sons bassinet pad perfectly without leaving any wrinkles. It fits regular oval bassinets and his larger cosleeper bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: corrine

customer_reviews.title: Great in Simmons Kids Auto-Gliding Elite Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Simmons Kids Silent Auto Gliding Elite Bassinet, Basketweave  that I bought secondhand since it did not come with a sheet. These fit and look great in our nursery. I find they feel soft and wash up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Smiley

customer_reviews.title: The green color is the same as in the picture and looks pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: The jersey fabric is really soft! The green color is the same as in the picture and looks pretty in person. The sheet fit my bassinet mattress perfectly and is easy to get on and off. It still looks and feels great after being washed quite a few times. The elastic doesn't go all the way around the sheet (it's only on each end) but the sides are long enough that it stays tucked under the mattress just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jj_danger_ranger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bassinet sheet! So soft and a great price! When it has gotten dirty from spit-up, I just toss it in the wash and it comes out looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the bassinet for my new grandchild. They fit well and are very soft and comfortable for the baby. Wash nicely. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Dream on Me Karley Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sheets that I found that fit our Dream on Me Karley bassinet's mattress. They're soft and cute! The white ones do tend to be a little sheer, so you can see the safety labels of the mattress through the sheet. That's the only drawback so far. We now have 3 of these to rotate through!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lane

customer_reviews.title: so soft
customer_reviews.text: these are so soft and comfortable. We purchased like 7 for our uppa baby bassinet and halo bassinet. These sheets fit both items well. wash well
customer_reviews.author: Nicolee

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This has a special place in my heart as it became our son's first bed. It is very soft and pretty. It fitted the bassinet but it was very snug.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Not crib sheets
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I just didn’t do enough research or what but these are not crib sheets. Maybe there was an option for crib sheets but I didn’t see them. These sheets are for bassinet only. They are very tiny! Although I will still use them because I have a bassinet that they will fit in, it’s not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Driver

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, super soft material. It shrunk after a couple of washed and would no longer fit on the bassinet mattress. But worked great for the time we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets for Chico lullago bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these based on other reviews stating they fit our Chico lullago bassinet which is hard to find sheets for, and they did fit the bassinet mattress quite well! The material is a little On the scratchy side but it did the job, and was great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Arm's Reach Clear-Vue Bassinet perfectly. Material is super soft and the color matches the bassinet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: The colors were BEAUTIFUL after washing put the sheet on fit perfect, tight no wrinkles so, no loose sheet. Soft and breathable to the touch my 1st grandson DEAN loved it and slept over 6 hours the first night at 2 weeks old .
customer_reviews.author: Yulonda

customer_reviews.title: Fits arms reach co-sleeper
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this sheet for the arms reach co-sleeper. It’s very stretchy so it fits the mattress. It’s a lot less expensive than the co-sleeper branded sheets.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This three pack of sheets is an amazing deal. We can have one on the changing pad, one in the co-sleeper, and one spare at all times. Soft and perfect weight for baby. There was little unraveling of the stitching in the elastic after a few washes, but the sheets are still in good shape. For the price the quality is on point.
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: My mistake in purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I had searched for crib sheets. Even though the description said in the product that it was bassinet sheets and I failed to realize it. I had opened the package to wash them. Since it was my mistake I kept them and gave them to a friend. They were super soft and she loves them. They have held up well and wash well too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet sheets
customer_reviews.text: Guess they are good just for a few time and then you can throw away, because these are not soft and the material look and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ross

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my standard bassinet mattress
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even reach the corners of my bassinet mattress so unusable. Does fit my diaper changing pad so keeping for that because I’d already washed them. (Bought 2) they are very thin but are soft and given how cheap they are if you have a mattress in the smaller side these would be good.
customer_reviews.author: A Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap feeling and looking. They fall apart easily in the wash. Also they just barely fit our bassinet. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: good but strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but they came with a strong chemical smell right out of the bag! I felt like I needed to wash it a few times before I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Hoppes

customer_reviews.title: I liked using this sheet better than the one that originally ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked using this sheet better than the one that originally came with the bassinet. It does pull a little tighter and bends the the more flimsy style mattresses, but once it lays in the bassinet, it lays flat and doesn't cause any bends or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The oval bassinet sheet fits my delta bassinet crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: popester4547

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on baby bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. They are not too thin and “crunchy” like some cheap sheets. These are soft and fit our arms reach bassinet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: pennepacker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: No complaints very good product. Will probably buy more. Perfect fit even after wash . Didnt pill and felt more soft after wash.
customer_reviews.author: s&p

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets for the bassinet mattress. They fit perfectly. Washed several times without any issues. A good deal since you only use them for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits Bassinet & Soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our Fisher Price bassinet and they are perfect. They fit the oval shaped bassinet nice and snug. They’re thin but very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these sheets. We use them everyday in our Chicco Lullago Bassinet. We actually prefer them over the ones that came with the bassinet. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany P.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Our baby hasn't used these yet, but we can't wait to bring him home from the hospital and see how well they work. The material feels like it will be quite durable. It's thick enough to not have wear issues, but thin enough to keep him from overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought some universal sheets for my baby's bassinet & they didn't fit. I returned them & got one of these. If I knew they would fit, I would've bought the pack of 2 lol. But I'm on my way to do that now..
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! We have a custom made cradle that my grandfather made when I was born. Trying to find sheets is not easy. These are soft and light and fit perfectly! They are a little thin but do not feel cheap. I will most likely purchase these again! (Maybe another color)
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite bassinet sheets
customer_reviews.text: I was completely surprised by how well the quality is for the price. These are very soft and fit my bassinet perfectly. These are my favorite sheets over my carter brand ones. I am going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a new parent.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the recipient says they use it for their baby daily and that it is soft and a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Tara York

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bassinet sheet for a Great price! As we brung home our newborn I was concerned about finding the right sheet ...This sheet fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Donisha Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: A little too small for the bassinet mattress. May be because I put it over the mattress pad, but got it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Newleaf

customer_reviews.title: So glad it work!
customer_reviews.text: Really needed this for my baby girl bassinet. I wasn’t sure bout the size or dimensions. But 🙏🏽 It was will fit since I didn’t know wat size or take any measurements. So glad it work & was able 2 use it.
customer_reviews.author: Genell Davis

customer_reviews.title: These fit our large bassinet mattress - that's the most important thing.
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size and fit our large, rectangular bassinet mattress without causing the mattress to buckle. The sheets are rather thin, though soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits bassinet
customer_reviews.text: EAsily fits my dream on me bassinet with rounded matress pad from kohls. Good quality now if only my daughter liked to sleep in the bassinet at night we would be in luck
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Fits Arms Reach Cosleeper
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and provides a good, snug fit for the Arms Reach Mini Bedside Cosleeper. Much better than paying $22 per sheet in the Arms Reach brand!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice bassinet sheet. Looks cute and fit a Delta Bassinet i bought here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mukaking

customer_reviews.title: Fit Arm's Reach Co-Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to find sheets that fit the Arm's Reach Clear-Vue and these do the job. They do fit, albeit barely, and are a good price. They are pretty thin, but not bad value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: khark

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased a while ago. It has been used for two different babies and has lasted well
customer_reviews.author: Vicki828

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Probably worth the money I spent, but it is a little too tight fitting and there is some mattress showing on both sides. Itself also a little see-through so you can see the pattern of the matress underneath.
customer_reviews.author: pattie earl

customer_reviews.title: Still functional
customer_reviews.text: Cute and soft. But shrunk after first wash. I bought it for my Chicco Lullago bassinet. While it does cover the pad, it is not quite wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Super thin
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I have the MiClassic rectangular bassinet and it as you can see doesn't fit too well. Barely got it to stretch as much as I did. I'm going to try it anyway as I already washed it and don't think I can return it. When I typed in "rectangular bassinet sheets" this came up. It is soft, but also super thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn hoitela

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid .. this is perfection! Easy to wash, soft and beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nyc

customer_reviews.title: Cute,soft, but thin
customer_reviews.text: Cute, good value for the price. They are pretty thin though, but again, for the price it's a good deal I think.
customer_reviews.author: amzshpr

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good, the fit is perfect for a bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jersey bassinet sheet for my new grandson and it is the only sheet he will sleep on. We have tried other sheets from big box stores that were cheaper AND more expensive. Nothing makes the baby feel more cozy! The quality is good, the fit is perfect for a bassinet. It doesn't curl the mattress and the ends stay tucked securely. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LRT Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Great design in it, soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cozy! Has stain resistant feom spitting up milk! Easy to wash! Great value for ifs money
customer_reviews.author: Christina Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Arms Reach Co-sleeper perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my Arms Reach Co-Sleeper. It fit perfectly. I loved that it came with two so you can always have a clean one ready. Fabric isn’t top of the line, a little thin, but it worked good enough to cover the mattress pad. So glad I came across a review that lead me to this product because the brand name covers cost a lot more than these!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Pennock

customer_reviews.title: This product i excellent. It fitted perfectly to the two bassinets
customer_reviews.text: Actually, yesterday I used the very first time because my granddaughters were born before yesterday. This product i excellent. It fitted perfectly to the two bassinets. I loved it. I will buy again in few more days. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and cheap. The fabric is soft, not sure how long it will last, but the baby won’t use the bassinet for too long anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought more extra for my baby's bassinet. I'm glad that its easy to clean and made from a soft fabric. Delivery came on time. Very well put in a package.
customer_reviews.author: Robert & Vannessa Martino, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking everywhere for covers for my babies bassinet that fit without extra bulkiness or being too tight. This one fits the Delta Glider perfectly. The quality is really good, soft and washes great doesn’t shrink. Would recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: MrsDibra

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material! I have the arms reach co ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material! I have the arms reach co sleeper mini that I needed extra sheets for that I didn't want to spend the $20 per sheet for. I took the plunge and ordered a set of these and they fit perfectly for being less than half the cost! Now I can buy multiple as we know babies need sheets changed more often than not sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Cadri Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, but a little thin. Great product for the price. And love the color. I bought it for my uppababy bassinet and it is a bit big, but I will just tuck it under the mattress that comes with the bassinet to make it snug.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: American Baby Company 100% Natural Cotton Value Jersey Knit Fitted Bassinet Sheet, Ecru, Soft Breathable, for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack| Color:EcruThe 100% Cotton value jersey knit fitted bassinet sheet is available is 5 soft pastel colors to coordinate with bedding. Fits standard size 15" X 33" bassinet pads. The 4" deep pockets provide a snug and secure fit. These cozy sheets are machine washable. Tumble dry low for best results. Machine wash cold with gentle cycle , tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 100% Jersey Cotton. Measures 15 inches x 33 inches x 4 inches.
SOFT. Our Value Jersey Bassinet sheets offer a warm, tee shirt like feel for exceptional comfort.
SELECTION. Available in a variety of colors to match any style.
QUALITY. Snug fit with 4” deep pockets and elastic trim. Machine washable and dryable.
VALUE. Quality and style at a great price.
